title: How to Turn Your Cozy Fall Getaway Into a Style Moment; Catch the last fleeting rays of warm days with athletic-inspired pieces from the fall collections that play well with classic styles.
text:
As nights turn chilly, strong options for a statement jacket include cozy shearling coats from Dior and Ralph Lauren, a green letterman jacket from Louis Vuitton or a flawlessly frayed Celine by Hedi Slimane vest. All of it goes down easy with denim from Re/Done and a pair of laced-up Converse, Gucci or Nike sneakers, to hit the ground running. â€”Natalia Barr

How to Turn Your Cozy Fall Getaway Into a Style Moment
